rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area that adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring a proper flow of positive energy. It is designed for joint family convenience and includes ample storage.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living space that facilitates family gatherings and social interactions. Vastu-compliant orientation and natural lighting are considered in the design to maximize energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for ease of serving meals. The dining area is positioned to encourage a harmonious family environment as per Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom ensuring privacy and relaxation. Designed with south-eastern orientation in mind for positive energy, beneficial for joint family members who require individual retreat spaces.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A functional guest bedroom that can also serve as an extra room when needed. Vastu considerations include optimal positioning for harmony and balance in energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An efficient kitchen area with integrated storage solutions, aligned to avoid facing the north-east, as per Vastu guidelines. It is designed for a joint family lifestyle.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact yet functional bathroom with water-saving fixtures, positioned in accordance to Vastu principles to ensure proper drainage and positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Storage Area/Utility Room
rooms.description: A multipurpose storage area for kitchen supplies and family essentials. Its placement is optimized to support a joint family living arrangement.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A grand entrance door that enhances security while welcoming positive energy. The door is designed to align with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Windows (Living Room)
openings.description: Large windows for natural light and ventilation in the living room area, following Vastu guidelines for optimal energy flow.

openings.name: Windows (Dining Area)
openings.description: Balanced window design to ensure adequate lighting in the dining space while maintaining privacy and adhering to Vastu norms.
